Hanzi: 觑

覰字的基本解释

覰
qū
同“觑”。

覰
qù
同“觑”。

覰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qù］
［《廣韻》七慮切，去御，清。］
亦作“覷1”。亦作“覻1”。
(1)看。
(2)窥伺；严密注视。
(3)探视。
(4)瞄。
(5)眯缝。
(6)看待；照看。

覰字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【見字部】　覰； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1137第01
【唐韻】七句切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】七慮切，?蛆去聲。【說文】拘覰，未密致也。　又【廣韻】伺視也。【唐書·張說傳】北?覰邊。【集韻】一作䁦。　又【韻會】通作徂。【前漢·張良傳】良與容徂擊秦皇帝。【師古註】徂謂密伺之也。本作覰。　又【集韻】千余切，音蛆。義同。【類篇】或作?。　【集韻】譌作覰，俗作覷，?非。

覰字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
覰字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qù］
["Guangyun" seven considerations cut, go to imperial, clear. ]
Also known as "Look 1". Also known as "覻1".
(1) Look.
(2) Watching; watching closely.
(3) Visitation.
(4) Take aim.
(5) Squint.
(6) Treat; look after.

【You Ji 1】【See the Department of Words】　觑; Kangxi strokes: 18; Page number: page 1137 01
[Tang Yun] Seven sentences cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Seven thoughts cut, the sound of maggots going away. [Said the text] Obsessively, not dense.　[Guangyun] Waiting for attention. [Tang Shu·Zhang Shuo Biography] North? Looking at the side. 【Jiyun】One for one.　[Rhyme Club] It's all in the works. [Previous Han·Zhang Liang Biography] Liang and Rongzu attacked the Emperor Qin. [Shi Gu's Note] It's a secret service. This is looking forward to.　[Jiyun] more than a thousand cuts, sound maggots. The same meaning. 【Classes】Or for?.　【Jiyun】Ziao pretends, vulgar pretends,? No.
